comments:
I got a similar NPE in an earlier VE (I believe it was 1.1) on Eclipse 3.1. I upgraded to VE 1.2M1 with Eclipse 3.2M4 (eclipse.buildId=I20051215-1506). When I created a new project, a new Visual Class, I got the NPE. 

Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.ui.workbench".

I have not started to add to the SWT Shell that I created. Code so far is 

package com.yantra.perf.samples;

import org.eclipse.swt.layout.GridLayout;
import org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Point;
import org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell;

public class sampleTree {

	private Shell sShell = null;  //  @jve:decl-index=0:visual-constraint="10,10"

	/**
	 * This method initializes sShell
	 */
	private void createSShell() {
		sShell = new Shell();
		sShell.setText("Yantra Performance Timer Trace Analyzer");
		sShell.setSize(new Point(623, 300));
		sShell.setLayout(new GridLayout());
	}

}

Problem is with the palette being in a viewer instead of the palette being within the editor. We will fix this, but until then the workaround is to close the palette viewer and not use it until the fix is available in a future build.
The changes have been released to HEAD.
